title: Acupuncture and Traditional Chinese Medicine - Chinese Herbs and Supplements near me — Northside Natural Health
description: Offered at Northside Natural Health, Acupuncture and Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) have been used for thousands of years as a powerful treatment for gynaecological and obstetric conditions. Acupuncture is a natural, way to restore balance in all parts of the physical, mental and emotions body.
cleaned_text: Benefits of Chinese Herbs and Supplements? Kylie only uses the highest quality Chinese Herbs & Supplements to support the individualised treatment for each client to reach their health and wellness goals. Kylie uses a combination of patent formulas in powders, capsules and pillules. The benefits of Chinese Herbs and Supplements are numerous and include effects such as: Painful / Heavy periods PMS and other hormone imbalances Menopausal symptoms Headaches and Migraines Anxiety and Depression Stress and associated disorders Fatigue Low Immunity Thyroid imbalances Allergies, Hayfever, Sinusitis Gastrointestinal disorders Musculo-skeletal issues Pain and Chronic muscle tension. Our Traditional Chinese Medicine practitioners Learn more about our trained and experienced Traditional Chinese Medicine
